h3_title: Captain Kalpa-Wave Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: Sometimes he'll throw several blood attacks into the mix one after the other to mess you up. Expect these bloody trails to come out in multiple directions (both above and from the sides) to try and confuse you, but remain focused on deflecting them as they arrive.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Kalpa-Wave.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Kalpa-Wave', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Captain Kalpa-Wave' and the sub-subsection 'Captain Kalpa-Wave Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Sometimes he'll throw several blood attacks into the mix one after the other to mess you up. Expect these bloody trails to come out in multiple directions (both above and from the sides) to try and confuse you, but remain focused on deflecting them as they arrive.
